category-def.name: g-Eclipse
category-def.label: g-Eclipse
category-def.description: This is the basic g-Eclipse feature that comes with middleware independent functionalities, i.e. the g-Eclipse core.

category-def.name: g-Eclipse add-ons
category-def.label: g-Eclipse add-ons
category-def.description: These features contain additional tools and functionality which are middleware independent.

category-def.name: g-Eclipse middleware components
category-def.label: g-Eclipse middleware components
category-def.description: These are g-Eclipse's middleware-specific features. If you would like to work on a specifiy middleware this is the place where you may find support for it.
